actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Water and Power.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Subcommittee on Water and Power. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 102-443.

official_title: A bill to authorize the sale of Bureau of Reclamation loans to the Redwood Valley County Water District, California.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to sell loans made by the Secretary under the Small Reclamation Projects Act to the Redwood Valley County Water District, California. Requires such Water District to pay all reasonable fees and expenses incurred relative to such sale. Terminates the authority to sell such loans one year after the enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the sale of Bureau of Reclamation loans to the Redwood Valley County Water District, California.
